title: Drow (monster)
data:
The **drow** is an elf-like monster in [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM") and [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack").

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 SLASH'EM](#SLASH.27EM)

- [2 dNetHack](#dNetHack)

  - [2.1 Drow](#Drow)
  - [2.2 Hedrow warrior](#Hedrow_warrior)
  - [2.3 Hedrow wizard](#Hedrow_wizard)
  - [2.4 Drow matron](#Drow_matron)
  - [2.5 Embraced drowess](#Embraced_drowess)
  - [2.6 Hedrow blademaster](#Hedrow_blademaster)

## SLASH'EM

- *Main article: [Drow (SLASH'EM)](/wiki/Drow_\(SLASH%27EM\) "Drow (SLASH'EM)")*

## dNetHack

In addition to elaborating on [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM")'s drow starting race, [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack") adds several classes of drow that can be encountered in the Mazes of Menace.

### Drow

| @ drow [![Drow.png](/images/2/28/Drow.png)](/wiki/File:Drow.png) |                     |
| ---------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------- |
| **[Difficulty](/wiki/Monster_difficulty "Monster difficulty")**  | 12                  |
| **Attacks**                                                      | Weapon 1d8 physical |
|                                                                  |                     |

| @ drow [![Drow.png](/images/2/28/Drow.png)](/wiki/File:Drow.png)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                              |
| ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------- |
| **[Difficulty](/wiki/Monster_difficulty "Monster difficulty")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | 12                           |
| **Attacks**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | Weapon 1d8 physical          |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                              |
| **Base [level](/wiki/Monster_level "Monster level")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | 10                           |
| **Base [experience](/wiki/Experience_points "Experience points")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | 216                          |

| **[Base MR](/wiki/Magic_resistance_\(monster\) "Magic resistance (monster)")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   | 2                            |
| **[Alignment](/wiki/Alignment#Monster_alignment "Alignment")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   | −3 (chaotic)                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                              |
| **[Frequency](/wiki/Monster_frequency "Monster frequency")** (by [normal means](/wiki/Normal_mechanism "Normal mechanism"))                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | 0 (Not randomly generated)   |
| **[Genocidable](/wiki/Genocide "Genocide")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | No                           |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                              |
| **[Weight](/wiki/Weight "Weight")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | 800                          |

| **[Size](/wiki/Physical_size "Physical size")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | medium                       |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                              |
| **[Resistances](/wiki/Resistance "Resistance")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | [sleep](/wiki/Sleep "Sleep") |
| **Resistances [conveyed](/wiki/Corpse "Corpse")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | [sleep](/wiki/Sleep "Sleep") |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                              |
| A drow:* has [a head, a couple of arms, and a torso](/wiki/Humanoid "Humanoid").
* is [carnivorous](/wiki/Carnivore "Carnivore").
* is [herbivorous](/wiki/Herbivore "Herbivore").
* is [omnivorous](/wiki/Omnivore "Omnivore").
* is not a valid [polymorphable](/wiki/Polymorph "Polymorph") form.
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* can pick up weapons and food.
* can be seen through [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision").
* cannot be [tamed](/wiki/Scroll_of_taming "Scroll of taming"). |                              |

The generic **drow** now only appears when [turn undead](/wiki/Turn_undead "Turn undead") is used on a corpse from a [drow zombie](/wiki/Drow_zombie "Drow zombie"), similar to [human](/wiki/Human_\(monster\) "Human (monster)") and [elf](/wiki/Elf_\(monster\) "Elf (monster)") monsters in vanilla. Its stats are almost identical to those of the elf.

| --------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |

| **Attacks**                                                     | Weapon 2d4 physical, Weapon 2d4 physical, Magic 0d3 [mage spell](/wiki/Mage_spell "Mage spell") |
|                                                                 |                                                                                                 |

|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                                                                                                 |
| **[Frequency](/wiki/Monster_frequency "Monster frequency")** (by [normal means](/wiki/Normal_mechanism "Normal mechanism"))                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        | 2 (Quite rare)                                                                                  |
| **[Genocidable](/wiki/Genocide "Genocide")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | No                                                                                              |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                                                                                                 |

| **[Size](/wiki/Physical_size "Physical size")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | medium                                                                                          |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                                                                                                 |
| **[Resistances](/wiki/Resistance "Resistance")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   | [sleep](/wiki/Sleep "Sleep")                                                                    |
| **Resistances [conveyed](/wiki/Corpse "Corpse")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | [sleep](/wiki/Sleep "Sleep")                                                                    |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                                                                                                 |
| A hedrow warrior:* has [a head, a couple of arms, and a torso](/wiki/Humanoid "Humanoid").
* is [carnivorous](/wiki/Carnivore "Carnivore").
* is [herbivorous](/wiki/Herbivore "Herbivore").
* is [omnivorous](/wiki/Omnivore "Omnivore").
* is male.
* is normally generated [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile").
* is [nasty](/wiki/M2_NASTY "M2 NASTY").
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* can pick up weapons and food.
* can be seen through [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision").
* normally appears in small [groups](/wiki/Group "Group").
* may [turn against you](/wiki/Treachery "Treachery") when tame.
* cannot be [tamed](/wiki/Scroll_of_taming "Scroll of taming"). |                                                                                                 |

The hedrow warrior attacks with weapons coated in sleep poison, and may also carry [potions of sleeping](/wiki/Potion_of_sleeping "Potion of sleeping"). They use drow racial equipment, meaning that their armor may evaporate if they stand too long in the light. However, their cloaks offer good protection against light.

Their spellcasting can be blocked by standing on an [Elbereth](/wiki/Elbereth "Elbereth") square, and has shorter range and a longer cooldown than is typical.

| A drow matron:* has [a head, a couple of arms, and a torso](/wiki/Humanoid "Humanoid").
* is [carnivorous](/wiki/Carnivore "Carnivore").
* is [herbivorous](/wiki/Herbivore "Herbivore").
* is [omnivorous](/wiki/Omnivore "Omnivore").
* is an [overlord to its kind](/wiki/M2_PRINCE "M2 PRINCE").
* is female.
* is normally generated [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile").
* is [nasty](/wiki/M2_NASTY "M2 NASTY").
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* can pick up weapons and food.
* can be seen through [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision").
* may [turn against you](/wiki/Treachery "Treachery") when tame.
* cannot be [tamed](/wiki/Scroll_of_taming "Scroll of taming"). |                                                                                        |

The **drow matron** uses drow racial equipment and can cast [clerical spells](/wiki/Monster_spell#Clerical "Monster spell"), with *summon spiders* substituted for *summon insects*.

| An embraced drowess:* has [no eyes](/wiki/Eyeless "Eyeless").
* has no hands.
* has no limbs.
* has [a head, a couple of arms, and a torso](/wiki/Humanoid "Humanoid").
* is [carnivorous](/wiki/Carnivore "Carnivore").
* is [herbivorous](/wiki/Herbivore "Herbivore").
* is [omnivorous](/wiki/Omnivore "Omnivore").
* is not a valid [polymorphable](/wiki/Polymorph "Polymorph") form.
* is an [overlord to its kind](/wiki/M2_PRINCE "M2 PRINCE").
* is female.
* is normally generated [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile").
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* can pick up weapons and food.
* can be seen through [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision").
* may [turn against you](/wiki/Treachery "Treachery") when tame.
* cannot be [tamed](/wiki/Scroll_of_taming "Scroll of taming").
* [does not move](/wiki/Sessile "Sessile"). |                                                                                                                  |

### Hedrow blademaster

| @ hedrow blademaster *(No tile)*                                |                                                                                                 |
| --------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| **[Difficulty](/wiki/Monster_difficulty "Monster difficulty")** | 18                                                                                              |
| **Attacks**                                                     | Weapon 3d4 physical, Weapon 3d4 physical, Magic 0d4 [mage spell](/wiki/Mage_spell "Mage spell") |

html:
Drow (monster)

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

The drow is an elf-like monster in SLASH'EM and dNetHack.

Contents

  • 1 SLASH'EM
  • 2 dNetHack
    • 2.1 Drow
    • 2.2 Hedrow warrior
    • 2.3 Hedrow wizard
    • 2.4 Drow matron
    • 2.5 Embraced drowess
    • 2.6 Hedrow blademaster

SLASH'EM

Main article: Drow (SLASH'EM)

dNetHack

In addition to elaborating on SLASH'EM's drow starting race, dNetHack adds several classes of drow that can be encountered in the Mazes of Menace.

Drow

@ drow
Difficulty 12
Attacks Weapon 1d8 physical
@ drow
Difficulty 12
Attacks

Weapon 1d8 physical

Base level 10
Base experience 216
Speed 12
Base AC 10
Base MR 2
Alignment −3 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable No
Weight 800
Nutritional value 350
Size medium
Resistances sleep
Resistances conveyed sleep

A drow:

  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • is carnivorous.
  • is herbivorous.
  • is omnivorous.
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is strong.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • can be seen through infravision.
  • cannot be tamed.

The generic drow now only appears when turn undead is used on a corpse from a drow zombie, similar to human and elf monsters in vanilla. Its stats are almost identical to those of the elf.

Hedrow warrior

@ hedrow warrior (No tile)
Difficulty 10
Attacks Weapon 2d4 physical, Weapon 2d4 physical, Magic 0d3 mage spell
@ hedrow warrior (No tile)
Difficulty 10
Attacks

Weapon 2d4 physical, Weapon 2d4 physical, Magic 0d3 mage spell

Base level 6
Base experience 135
Speed 12
Base AC 10
Base MR 60
Alignment −9 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) 2 (Quite rare)
Genocidable No
Weight 800
Nutritional value 350
Size medium
Resistances sleep
Resistances conveyed sleep

A hedrow warrior:

  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • is carnivorous.
  • is herbivorous.
  • is omnivorous.
  • is male.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • is nasty.
  • is strong.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • can be seen through infravision.
  • normally appears in small groups.
  • may turn against you when tame.
  • cannot be tamed.

The hedrow warrior attacks with weapons coated in sleep poison, and may also carry potions of sleeping. They use drow racial equipment, meaning that their armor may evaporate if they stand too long in the light. However, their cloaks offer good protection against light.

Their spellcasting can be blocked by standing on an Elbereth square, and has shorter range and a longer cooldown than is typical.

Hedrow wizard

@ hedrow wizard (No tile)
Difficulty 12
Attacks Weapon 1d4 physical, Magic 0d6 mage spell
@ hedrow wizard (No tile)
Difficulty 12
Attacks

Weapon 1d4 physical, Magic 0d6 mage spell

Base level 9
Base experience 201
Speed 12
Base AC 10
Base MR 40
Alignment −6 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 800
Nutritional value 350
Size medium
Resistances sleep
Resistances conveyed sleep

A hedrow wizard:

  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • is carnivorous.
  • is herbivorous.
  • is omnivorous.
  • is male.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • is strong.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • can be seen through infravision.
  • appears only in Gehennom.
  • may turn against you when tame.
  • cannot be tamed.

Drow matron

@ drow matron
Difficulty 15
Attacks Weapon 2d4 physical, Magic 0d0 clerical spell
@ drow matron
Difficulty 15
Attacks

Weapon 2d4 physical, Magic 0d0 clerical spell

Base level 12
Base experience 366
Speed 12
Base AC 10
Base MR 60
Alignment −9 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) 2 (Quite rare)
Genocidable No
Weight 800
Nutritional value 350
Size medium
Resistances sleep
Resistances conveyed sleep

A drow matron:

  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • is carnivorous.
  • is herbivorous.
  • is omnivorous.
  • is an overlord to its kind.
  • is female.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • is nasty.
  • is strong.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • can be seen through infravision.
  • may turn against you when tame.
  • cannot be tamed.

The drow matron uses drow racial equipment and can cast clerical spells, with summon spiders substituted for summon insects.

Embraced drowess

@ embraced drowess (No tile)
Difficulty 27
Attacks Cast 0d0 clerical spell, Passive 2d4 webbing
@ embraced drowess (No tile)
Difficulty 27
Attacks

Cast 0d0 clerical spell, Passive 2d4 webbing

Base level 24
Base experience 786
Speed 24
Base AC 4
Base MR 100
Alignment 9 (lawful)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable No
Weight 800
Nutritional value 350
Size medium
Resistances sleep
Resistances conveyed sleep

An embraced drowess:

  • has no eyes.
  • has no hands.
  • has no limbs.
  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • is carnivorous.
  • is herbivorous.
  • is omnivorous.
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is an overlord to its kind.
  • is female.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • is strong.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • can be seen through infravision.
  • may turn against you when tame.
  • cannot be tamed.
  • does not move.

Hedrow blademaster

@ hedrow blademaster (No tile)
Difficulty 18
Attacks Weapon 3d4 physical, Weapon 3d4 physical, Magic 0d4 mage spell
@ hedrow blademaster (No tile)
Difficulty 18
Attacks

Weapon 3d4 physical, Weapon 3d4 physical, Magic 0d4 mage spell

Base level 14
Base experience 354
Speed 14
Base AC 10
Base MR 60
Alignment −6 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 800
Nutritional value 350
Size medium
Resistances sleep
Resistances conveyed sleep

A hedrow blademaster:

  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • is carnivorous.
  • is herbivorous.
  • is omnivorous.
  • is male.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • is strong.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • can be seen through infravision.
  • appears only in Gehennom.
  • may turn against you when tame.
  • cannot be tamed.

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.

rawPage:
The '''drow''' is an elf-like monster in [[SLASH'EM]] and [[dNetHack]].

== SLASH'EM ==
{{main|Drow (SLASH'EM)}}

== dNetHack ==
In addition to elaborating on [[SLASH'EM]]'s drow starting race, [[dNetHack]] adds several classes of drow that can be encountered in the Mazes of Menace.

===Drow===
{{monster
 |name=drow
 |symbol={{black|@}}
 |difficulty=12
 |level=10
 |experience=216
 |speed=12

 |carnivore=1
 |herbivore=1
 |omnivore=1
 |nopoly=1
 |strong=1
 |collect=1
 |infravisible=1
 |notame=1
 }}
}}
The generic '''drow''' now only appears when [[turn undead]] is used on a corpse from a [[drow zombie]], similar to [[Human (monster)|human]] and [[Elf (monster)|elf]] monsters in vanilla. Its stats are almost identical to those of the elf.

{{clear}}

The hedrow warrior attacks with weapons coated in sleep poison, and may also carry [[potion of sleeping|potions of sleeping]]. They use drow racial equipment, meaning that their armor may evaporate if they stand too long in the light. However, their cloaks offer good protection against light.

Their spellcasting can be blocked by standing on an [[Elbereth]] square, and has shorter range and a longer cooldown than is typical.
